title: Chocolate Peanut Butter Traybake
ingredients: ['200g plain flour', '150g dark brown soft sugar', '110g butter, melted', '2 egg yolks', '110g plain chocolate chips', '150g icing sugar', '260g peanut butter', '50g butter, melted', '1 teaspoon vanilla extract', '1 tablespoon milk', '5 tablespoons plain chocolate chips', '1 tablespoon butter or margarine']
